attributes.review: This app was so slow my grandma could walk across america faster than this 🙄 and she’s in a wheelchair. Honestly, I was expecting a lot but was faced with a horrible fate of this terrible app. Won’t be using it ever again ❤️
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: When I tryed to download it was very glitchy and kept shutting my phone down so I had to delete it and I’m glad I did it almost completely broke it
attributes.title: Worst app almost broke my phone with virus

attributes.review: This app is useless and it doesn’t work well. it’s glitchy and should be removed from the app store. It took days to download and it crashes almost every time you open it.
attributes.title: horrible DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app is just terrible. First, took a while to download. Next when I opened the app, a notification came up and called me a “horse face” and said “ I was a nasty, fat pig”. I guess the app must’ve sensed I was a woman. Disappointed with our orange racist, misogynistic, sexist president.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: So when I opened the app I was met with an orange, now I’m severely allergic to oranges if I’m even near an orange I get this horrible rash and swelling -10/10  do not recommend for those with orange allergies. In addition to this, it kept crashing and I felt very threatened by this app.

attributes.review: First of all, it took FOREVER to download. In the process it crashed my phone and gave it AT LEAST 3 viruses (not coronavirus thankfully because that’s a hoax). It was so poorly made I’m pretty sure I lost brain cells just trying to figure out how to use it. DO NOT RECOMMEND!! 🤬🤢
